QuestData.Title: The Lost Apprentice
QuestData.Description: If you have a moment, $c...$B$BOne of the students I was teaching has gone to explore the darkmist ruins to the south by himself. I warned him that it was too dangerous, but he was too excited to listen. I had spoken with him earlier about an amulet that is concealed within those ruins. Now, I fear that he may have run off in search of it, because of me...$B$BEstulan has forbidden us to pursue him. If you go there, could you please look for him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for the Lost Apprentice in the Darkmist Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: <The apprentice's body is cold. He has been dead for a while.>
